document.masterDocTitle: Review of genus Hydropsyche Pictet 1834 (Insecta: Trichoptera: Hydropsychidae) from India

INDIA
: Sikkim : Singhik, 1500 m , 14-ix-2009 , 6 males , Pandher & Parey, NZC; Chungthang, 1600 m , 15-ix-2009 , 5 males , 7 females , Pandher & Parey, NZC; Sangkalang, 800 m , 13-v-2009 , 3 males , 4 females , Pandher & Parey, NZC; Mangan, 1100 m , 12-v-2009 , 7 males , 7 females , Pandher & Parey, NZC; Padamchen, 1100 m , 3-v-2009 , 2 males , Pandher & Parey, NZC.
Uzbekistan.
